fundsr 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • fundsr: Rolling differences and Xetra liquidity plots

    Reference

    All functions

    amun()

    Import an Amundi fund

    dl_funds()

    Download fund data according to the configured download list

    fund_imp()

    Import a fund's NAV data and register its benchmark mapping

    get_csv()

    Read a two-column (date, NAV/index level) CSV file for a fund/index.

    get_fund_index()

    Get the internal fund index map

    get_msci_tsv()

    Read an MSCI two-column TSV file

    ggexport()

    Export queued SVG files to PNG using Inkscape

    ggink()

    Save a plot as SVG and queue it for optional PNG export via Inkscape

    hsbc()

    Import an HSBC fund

    import_funds()

    Load or refresh the fund storage environment

    inve()

    Import an Invesco fund

    ishs()

    Import an iShares fund

    join_env()

    Join all tibbles in an environment with optional late left-joins

    msci()

    Import an MSCI index sheet and register benchmark mappings

    rcd_plot()

    Plot rolling return differences against benchmark

    read_xlm_directory()

    Read and combine XLM data from multiple Xetra XLSX files

    roll_diffs()

    Compute rolling annualized tracking differences (CAGR or log-return)

    run_plots()

    Generate and export all configured rolling-difference plots

    setg()

    Set or update a cached object in the package storage environment

    spdr()

    Import an SPDR fund

    ubs()

    Import a UBS fund

    vang()

    Import a Vanguard fund

    xlm_plot()

    Plot Xetra Liquidity Measure (XLM) time series

    xtra()

    Import a Xtrackers (XTRA) fund

    Contents
